item.title: DIY Serverless Platform with Python3 and Docker
item.description:
Description

A walkthrough on how I built my own serverless platform to run both ephemeral and long-lasting functions in Python on top of Docker, capable of handling REST and websocket connections. Will go over architecture, show code, and discuss pain points as well as next steps. #pyconjamaica2016
item.dc:creator: Joir-dan Gumbs
